news_header: YIT construction company reported a decline in turnover for Q4 and the whole year, with a significant drop in expected profits, but housing sales increased.
news_original_title: YIT:n tulos jäi selvästi odotuksista – Yhtiö myi vuoden aikana Suomessa lähes 600 asuntoa
news_text: YIT released its Q4 and annual results, showing a decrease in turnover from EUR 597 million to EUR 521 million in Q4, and from EUR 2,163 million to EUR 1,820 million for the year. Adjusted operating profit was EUR 13 million for Q4, below the expected EUR 22.1 million, and EUR 32 million for the year, also below expectations. The order book grew to EUR 2,941 million, with 79% sold. No dividends will be distributed, and the CEO expressed dissatisfaction with the negative annual result despite growth in housing sales, particularly in Finland and the Baltic region.
